text: This is a list of islands of Germany. ==Largest islands== Largest islands of Germany # Island Sea Land Area (km2) 1\. Rügen Baltic Sea Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania 926 2\. Usedom Baltic Sea Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania 373 (445 km²1) 3\. Fehmarn Baltic Sea Schleswig-Holstein 185 4\. Sylt North Sea Schleswig-Holstein 99 5\. Föhr North Sea Schleswig-Holstein 82 6\. Pellworm North Sea Schleswig-Holstein 37 7\. Poel Baltic Sea Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania 36 8\. Borkum North Sea Lower Saxony 31 9\. Norderney North Sea Lower Saxony 26 10\. Amrum North Sea Schleswig-Holstein 20.46 11\. Helgoland North Sea Schleswig-Holstein 1.7 ==Islands in the Baltic Sea== * Fehmarn * Poel * Walfisch island * Langenwerder * Hiddensee * Rügen * Dänholm * Vilm * Greifswalder Oie * Ruden * Ummanz * Usedom ==Islands in the North Sea== * Helgoland * East Frisian Islands (in the Wadden Sea) ** Borkum ** Buise (former island, disappeared) ** Lütje Hörn ** Kachelotplate ** Memmert ** Juist ** Norderney ** Baltrum ** Langeoog ** Spiekeroog ** Wangerooge ** Mellum * Neuwerk * Scharhörn * North Frisian Islands ** Sylt ** Föhr ** Amrum ** Pellworm ** Nordstrand (former island, now peninsula) * Halligen (also part of North Frisian Islands) ** Langeneß ** Norderoog ** Süderoog ** Nordstrandischmoor ** Oland (German island) ** Südfall ** Gröde-Appelland ** Hooge ** Hallig Habel ** Hamburger Hallig ==Islands in the Elbe River== * Lühesand ==Islands in the Weser River== * Harriersand ==Islands in the Lake Constance== * Mainau Island * Reichenau Island * Lindau == Other websites == *Islands - Germany Tourism (EN) Germany * Islands
title: List of islands of Germany
